column2: ThingsCon is a global community & event platform for IoT practitioners. Our mission is to foster the creation of a human-centric & responsible Internet of Things (IoT).
A computer science conference with a cross-disciplinary focus that brings together researchers and practitioners interested in fairness: accountability: and transparency in socio-technical systems.

column1: Auditing Algorithms From the Outside: Methods and Implications
Workshop on Data and Algorithmic Transparency
Governing Algorithms A conference on computation: automation: and control
